Articles.Content:
Banned for going all Shakespearian.

Edit: Well, that's embarrassing, too many Forum Games today. Sorry Endersmens.

Edited September 15, 2014 by Red Iron Crown
banned? h...how could you?
Not calling someone a cheater?! Cheater! Only REEL cheaters don't call someone a cheater!
Failing to use bold pink Comic Sans? Definitely Cheating... Real posters would never resort to boring font choices

My eyes are now bleeding, thanks to your cheating! Leave my eyes alone, like a non-cheater!

Edit: Well, that's embarrassing, too many Forum Games today. Sorry Endersmens.

Hahaha it's alright, I was just messing with you.
Venusvenusvenusvenusvenus? VENUS! Venusvenusvenus.
Bammed for Venus overload.
Bamming? Cheater! Only Bammers cheat!
No mud in your avatar or signature? Cheating of the highest order. Good players walk through mud all day, every day, as exercise.
No signature? HYPOCRITE! Only HYPOCRITES cheat like that!
Insulting me? You could get seriously banned for that. And now, if you don't mind, I'm going to bed.
Going to bed while the night is young? Must be getting extra rest for the next round of cheating tomorrow!
An account older than mine? All accounts from 2011 are clearly those of time-travelling cheaters. We non-Tardis-using posters registered in 2012 or later.
You know ages pretty good , cheater
A space before the comma? No period? Typos mean cheaters!

Insulting me? You could get seriously banned for that. And now, if you don't mind, I'm going to bed.

This is not ban the user above you. This is the cheating game. Please stop crossing the games.

Back on topic, referrencing space, and commas? Commas are part of grammar, not a vacuum that holds the universe, and not knowing the difference is cheating.

Non-English accents on an English word? Even Merriam-Webster would call that cheating, I believe your picture is featured in their definition of "cheater". Proper English speakers leave the accents to other languages.

It sort of looks like a hawk facing right, but it also looks like a cartoon rocket flying left. And begging for attention, that's just plain cheating. Stop it. Rid the world of this cheaty scum!
You guessed correctly, it is rocket flying left. Now I shall have to find some other reason to call you a cheater.
You see something other than squares? Obviously you're using some sort of cheat browser. Those of us using regular old Chrome don't see those cheater characters.
Ha! You cheat! I AM using Chrome! (But which Chrome? Mwahahaha!)

I'm using chrome too, Chrome OS, Chrome Browser, Chrome Laptop shell (jk)

Not specifying what chromes you use? That's some shady cheating right there! Step into the light of non-cheating!
Chrome OS? Ha! Only Cheaters use such heathen operating systems! I'll have you know I am using the Chrome mobile browser (the best mobile browser ever!) on my phone. Take that, you Cheater!
